de.erichseifert.gral.data

Interface DataListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlot, BarPlot, BarPlot.BarPlotLegend, BoxPlot, BoxPlot.BoxPlotLegend, Convolution, DataSeries, EnumeratedData, Filter, Histogram, Histogram1D, Median, PiePlot, PiePlot.PiePlotLegend, RasterPlot, Resize, RowSubset, Statistics, ValueLegend, XYPlot

    public interface DataListener
    Interface that can be implemented to listen for changes in data sources.
    See Also:
    DataSource

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dataAdded(DataSource source, DataChangeEvent... events)
      Method that is invoked when data has been added.
      void dataRemoved(DataSource source, DataChangeEvent... events)
      Method that is invoked when data has been removed.
      void dataUpdated(DataSource source, DataChangeEvent... events)
      Method that is invoked when data has been updated.

    • Method Detail

      • dataAdded

        void dataAdded(DataSource source,
             DataChangeEvent... events)
        Method that is invoked when data has been added. This method is invoked by objects that provide support for DataListeners and should not be called manually.
        Parameters:
        source - Data source that has been changed.
        events - Optional event object describing the data values that have been added.

      • dataUpdated

        void dataUpdated(DataSource source,
               DataChangeEvent... events)
        Method that is invoked when data has been updated. This method is invoked by objects that provide support for DataListeners and should not be called manually.
        Parameters:
        source - Data source that has been changed.
        events - Optional event object describing the data values that have been updated.

      • dataRemoved

        void dataRemoved(DataSource source,
               DataChangeEvent... events)
        Method that is invoked when data has been removed. This method is invoked by objects that provide support for DataListeners and should not be called manually.
        Parameters:
        source - Data source that has been changed.
        events - Optional event object describing the data values that have been removed.
